file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 28-41-00-05 - ELECTRICAL FUEL QUANTITY INDICATING - ADJUSTMENT/TEST

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL ELECTRICAL FUEL QUANTITY INDICATING - ADJUSTMENT/TEST EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do a check on the electrical fuel quantity indicating system (Fuel low level logic). B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ELECTRICAL FUEL QUANTITY - OPERA- ALL 28-41-00-700-801-A ♦ TIONAL CHECK EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 28-41-00 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 28-41-00-700-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. ELECTRICAL FUEL QUANTITY - OPERATIONAL CHECK A. General (1) The function of this task is to do a check of the fuel low level logic and its messages on the EICAS. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-03/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION ENERGIZATION OF THE AIRCRAFT WITH AN EX- AMM TASK 20-40-01-860-801-A/200 TERNAL POWER SOURCE C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 223LZ Cockpit D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Energize the aircraft with External DC Power Supply ( AMM TASK 20-40-01-860-801- A/200). (2) Open access door 223LZ ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100) to get access to the maintenance panel. J. Operationally Check Electrical Fuel Quantity Indicating System (Fuel Low Level Logic) (Figure 501) SUBTASK 710-002-A (1) Set the fuel page on the MFD. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 28-41-00 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (a) Move the “FUEL QTY IND” toggle switch on the maintenance panel. Result: 1 The EICAS display shows these messages and indications: • FUEL 1 - 2 LO LEVEL (WARNING). • TANK 1 - 2 shows 1130 kg ÃÂ± 10 kg (2500 lb). 2 The MFD shows these indications: • TANK 1 - 1130 kg ÃÂ± 10 kg (2500 lb). • TANK 2 - 1130 kg ÃÂ± 10 kg (2500 lb). • TOTAL - 2260 kg (5000 lb). 3 The Warning lights flash. 4 The Aural warning operates (Bell). NOTE: After 10 seconds, the indications above go back to the normal condition. (2) Press one of the master warning lights to stop the lights. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Deenergize the aircraft ( AMM TASK 20-40-01-860-801-A/200). (2) Close access door 223LZ ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 28-41-00 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
